name: condom (unopened)
description: A contraceptive device that fits all sizes.  Take it out of the wrapping first if you want to use it.  ...If there's even someone you could use it on in this world, that is.

name: shoddy condom (unopened)
description:
A contraceptive device that fits all sizes.  Take it out of the wrapping first if you want to use it.
* This one seems to be quite <color_yellow>old</color> however.  You should refrain from using it to avoid unnecessary *problems*.

name: condom
description: A contraceptive device that fits all sizes.  If every person in the world carried it around, its purpose would've been clear by now.
//: 本当はポリイソプレンやラテックス製なのだろうけど、公式のゴム手袋もplasticだし...materials設定するのめんどいし...
あぶない方。使えるけど確率で破れる。
name: shoddy condom
description: A contraceptive device that fits all sizes.  This one practically lost its protective qualities and is likely to break.

//: collarじゃないよ！ほんとだよ！ suuuuuuuuure
name: exorcism choker
description: A choker made of blessed silver which can seal the evil in one's heart.  If you manage to put this on a Demon, surely you will be able to make a good friend.

name: scroll of naming
description: A scroll used to assign unique names to NPCs.  Consumable, disappears after use.

name: scroll of artifact
description: A scroll used to create an artifact.  Consumable, disappears after use.

name: bio-massager
description: Living massaging sleeve made of blob.  On the side of it, there's a portrait of a famous porn actress along with the advertising message: "Complete reproduction of DNA structure! Genuine feeling, anywhere, anytime, in your pocket!"
